badge_template_activities.title: Customer will learn how to build a modern data lake entailing capabilities such as ACID Transactions, Update/Delete support, Time Travel, Compaction of small files, and so on. Moreover, assets from this immersion day can be used to educate customers about the open sources frameworks supported by AWS as well as Lake Formation Governed Tables. This can specially important in compete situation with vendors like Databricks that have strong messaging about LakeHouses with Delta Lake.
